"Omumuyɛnyi ne mbrato kasa wɔ n'akoma m: "Osiandɛ obu noho bi wɔ nankasa n'enyi do
"N'anomu nsɛm yɛ emumuyɛsɛm na ndaadaa: Oegyaa dɛ ohu nyansa na ɔyɛ papa."
"Ɔdwendwen emumuyɛ ho wɔ ne mpa do; Ɔdze noho si ɔkwan a onnye mu; Na onnkyir bɔn."

w'adɔyɛ wɔ sorsor; Wo nokwardzi kodu wimu tɔnn."

"Omumuyɛnyi ne mbrato kasa wɔ n'akoma m: "Wo tsenenee tse dɛ Nyankopɔn mbepɔw; Wo ntsɛmbu yɛ bun a no mu dɔ: EWURADZE
ɔwo na ekora nyimpa na abowa do."
mbrɛ w'adɔyɛ dua som bo a: Na adasamba guan dɔ w'atsaban no nwinwin ase."

"Omumuyɛnyi ne mbrato kasa wɔ n'akoma m: "Wo fie mu ndzepa bɛmee hɔn; Na ɔwo ebɛma wɔanom w'enyigye esutsen no."
"Osiandɛ wo nkyɛn na nkwa nsunyiwa wɔ: Wo kan mu na yebohu kan."
"Ma w'adɔyɛ ntoa do mma hɔn a wonyim wo; Na wo tsenenee mma hɔn a wɔtsen wɔ akoma mu."

Na mma mma ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi nsa nntwe me nnkɔ."

"Omumuyɛnyi ne mbrato kasa wɔ n'akoma m: "Hɔ na emumuyɛfo atotɔ: Woesun hɔn ahwehwe famu
